title: I have a confession...
body:
I have an addiction to purple.
[](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_0.jpg)
It all started when I saw that a legacy skin for my main was in a bundle. Knowing full well that I could not buy the skin on any other day, I decided to purchase the bundle despite not owning many of the champions within.

Included was {{champion:117}} and her Wicked Lulu skin.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_2.jpg

I decided "Why the heck not?" and began playing Lulu.

She was fun. Her character was very likable and helping people out in her role was, somehow, unlike any other support/mage I've played. I wasn't the greatest Lulu played of all time, in fact, I was rather mediocre.

That didn't stop me from buying Dragon Trainer Lulu when it went on sale.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_3.jpg

I figured that was enough skins for one champion...

...Until Winter Wonder Lulu showed up in my Teemoing shop.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_4.jpg

I couldn't help it! It had snowy particles, a new recall animation, and who doesn't like poros?

As if that wasn't enough, Pool Party Lulu went on sale.
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Lulu_5.jpg

And yes, I got that one too.

So there, I admit it. I love purple. I've been jumping at every opportunity to fulfill my passion to purple.

Accept me or deny me, I just had to get that out of my system.

######And I also wanted an excuse to use this GIF again:
http://i.imgur.com/iyu9UQ4.gif?noredirect
